attributes.name: approvedBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

attributes.name: approvedByDate
attributes.description: The date the entry was approved.

attributes.name: bonusRate
attributes.description: Bonus rate used to calculate bonus depreciation.

attributes.name: businessUnitCode
attributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

attributes.name: capitalAdjustment
attributes.description: Value of capital adjustment after considering impairment transaction.

attributes.name: depreciationEffectiveDate
attributes.description: The date upon which fixed asset depreciation will take into effect.

attributes.name: depreciationForPeriod
attributes.description: Depreciation on the fixed asset for the relevant period to be charged in the books.

attributes.name: depreciationRate
attributes.description: Rate at which depreciation will be charged on the carrying amount of fixed assets.

attributes.name: depreciationReserve
attributes.description: Total depreciation expense including the bonus depreciation recognized for the asset.

attributes.name: enteredBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

attributes.name: enteredDate
attributes.description: The date the order was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

attributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciableBasis
attributes.description: Value of the asset against which depreciation is calculated.

attributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciationAmount
attributes.description: Depreciation amount charged to the profit and loss account depending on the method of depreciation.

attributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciationId
attributes.description: ID associated with depreciation charged on the asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciationMethod
attributes.description: Method used for calculation depreciation, e.g. reducing balance, straight line.

attributes.name: fixedAssetFairValue
attributes.description: Estimated amount of the fair value of the asset on the open market, used for valuation.

attributes.name: fixedAssetId
attributes.description: ID associated with fixed asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetReplacementCost
attributes.description: Estimated cost to replace fixed asset, used for valuation purposes.

attributes.name: fixedAssetSalvageValue
attributes.description: Estimated amount of consideration the entity would expect to receive on scrapping the asset for salvage at the end of its useful life.

attributes.name: fixedAssetUsefulLife
attributes.description: The period/time an asset is expected to be functional and fit-for-use.

attributes.name: generalFund
attributes.description: Value of general fund after considering impairment effect.

attributes.name: glAccount
attributes.description: Identifier of GL Account on which depreciation on value asset has been posted. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the glDetail, trialBalance and chartOfAccounts

attributes.name: glTransactionId
attributes.description: Transaction ID in the GL for recognising depreciation on an asset.

attributes.name: impairmentAmount
attributes.description: Impairment loss amount of the asset.

attributes.name: lastModifiedBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

attributes.name: lastModifiedByDate
attributes.description: The modifying date of the last person modifying the fixed asset depreciation entry.

attributes.name: lotNumber
attributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

attributes.name: ltdProduction
attributes.description: Life-to-date production for a units of production asset.

attributes.name: revalAmortisation
attributes.description: Amount of revaluation reserve amortised during the current period.

attributes.name: segment01
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment02
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment03
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment04
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment05
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: serialNumber
attributes.description: Serial number for asset, used by manufacturer for identification.

attributes.name: uniqueId
attributes.description: ID associated with depreciation made to the fixed asset.

attributes.name: userDefined1
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userDefined2
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: ytdImpairment
attributes.description: Year-to-date impairment amount.
